income_messages:
From: a***********n@hotmail.com
To: CRAWLER
Time: 2023-03-22 20:00:37
SUBJECT: Attention beneficiary
Attention beneficiary
This is Scott Albert  And I want to inform you that the United Nations
and the US Financial Intelligence Network has approved the final
release of your seized package/parcel . The funds  declared is the
only genuinely approved compensation funds in your name since 2018 and
I want to find out If you agreed to forfeit your unclaimed
compensation funds  or personally abandoned the funds till date? This
is the only legitimately approved compensation fund under your name
which is tagged unclaimed after years by the US Authorities.
The funds was stopped from going through Customs And US Authorities by
finCEN as the transfer/Delivery of that amount of money they consider
A deliberate violation of the Article 102 Section 36 of the United
Nations Security Council Resolution of the "CLEAN BILL" and this is
why
 you are required to complete the legal Clearance to be able to
receive the funds to avoid being revoked or confiscated by the US
Government in the coming week
. However no one knows why you abandon
the funds till now and haven't shown any interest in claiming these
funds since 2018 till date ? Are you alive ? The funds are abandoned
and no one knows If you are alive or healthy? if you receive this
email then respond so we know that you are alive then decide If you
want to finally  forfeit the funds to the US Government or go ahead
with the Customs clearance and the delivery of the package.
Sincerely.
Scott Rivera.
From: a***********n@hotmail.com
To: yd97781@m**************m
Time: 2023-03-23 17:39:48
SUBJECT: Re: Attention beneficiary
Dear Frederick Bennett
This is to acknowledge receipt of your email. You have a legally approved compensation fund worth $4.6Million and the issue with the release of the funds is the clearance/declaration, this is a legally approved compensation fund in your name.
The package has been on hold since 2021 because of clearance issues. The delivery/transfer of the fund was stopped by finCEN because without the clearance/declaration of the funds authorities it violates Article 102 Section 36 of the United Nations Security Council Resolution of the "CLEAN BILL", but have recently approved the release of the fund.
Therefore, as soon as you pay the clearance fee of $385 and complete the declaration, the delivery shall be completed in 72hrs.
Sincerely,
Scott Rivera.
From: a***********n@hotmail.com
To: yd97781@m**************m
Time: 2023-03-24 11:34:56
SUBJECT: Re: Attention beneficiary
Dear Frederick Bennett,
I acknowledge receipt of your email. your package is waiting for clearance but if the clearance is not completed in the next few days, it will be confiscated by the Authorities in Chicago IL.
Therefore I need you to reconfirm your delivery address, phone number,  and copy of your DL to enable the delivery Agent complete the clearance/declaration form today.
I look forward to hearing from you as soon as possible.
The delivery Agebt is Mr. Joseph Bernard and he is a Unitrd Nations Diplomat /Representative.
Regards
Scott Rivera.
